text:
Dear Pablo and Nicolas,
thanks all for the veeery precious feedback! I`ll start testing again the sample using the advices of single-beam/raw data; I`ll let you know if I can characterize better the issue (I`m also in contact with Miltenyi).  PS: I also noticed that is “doubling” is not constant in Y and Z; seems more pronounced on the sample side far from the detection lens.

elements.text:
Dear Pablo and Nicolas,
thanks all for the veeery precious feedback! I`ll start testing again the sample using the advices of single-beam/raw data; I`ll let you know if I can characterize better the issue (I`m also in contact with Miltenyi).  PS: I also noticed that is “doubling” is not constant in Y and Z; seems more pronounced on the sample side far from the detection lens.
